title: Stores
subtitle: Connect and manage your e-commerce stores

disconnectModal.body: Orders from this channel will remain, but nothing will be synced once you confirm.
disconnectModal.title: Are you sure you want to disconnect {{storeName}} from Shippo?

storeRow.expiredToken: This store connection has expired. For your security, please reconnect your store.

editForm.title: Manage Store Connection
editForm.syncPrompt: Do you want your labels to be synchronized back to {{storeName}}?
editForm.isAutoFulfill: Sync tracking numbers and mark orders as fulfilled in {{storeName}}
editForm.isImportPosOrdersEnabled: Import POS orders from {{storeName}} into Shippo
editForm.isFulfillEmailEnabled: Send customer tracking notification via {{storeName}} instead of Shippo

zeroState.message: You haven't connected to any e-commerce channel
zeroState.description: Sync order details directly into Shippo by connecting your store

connectModal.title: Connect Your Store
connectModal.subtitle: Select your store's e-commerce platform to connect and import orders

managementSidePanel.title: Manage connection
managementSidePanel.successMessage: Your {{storeName}} store settings have been updated

disconnectDialog.title: Disconnect {{storeName}} store
disconnectDialog.description: Are you sure you want to disconnect this {{storeName}} store ({{storeDisplayName}}) from Shippo? Existing orders from this store will remain in Shippo, but no new orders will be synced once you disconnect.
disconnectDialog.successMessage: Your {{storeName}} store has been disconnected from Shippo

shopify.description: To connect, input your store URL below. Then, click <0>Continue</0> to proceed to Shopify where you will need to grant Shippo access. Once access is granted, you will see your orders synced in Shippo.
shopify.label: Shopify store URL
shopify.error: URL for the shop is required

amazon.description: To connect, select the country of your Amazon store. Then, click <0>Continue</0> to proceed to Amazon where you will need to grant Shippo access. Once access is granted, you will see your orders synced in Shippo.
amazon.label: Country

errors.STORE_ALREADY_CONNECTED_ERROR: You already have a {{store}} store connected
errors.POSSIBLE_CREDENTIALS_ERROR: Could not connect your {{store}} store. Are your credentials correct?
errors.MISSING_SCOPES_ERROR: Could not connect your {{store}} store. Missing permissions in your delegated access key.

amazon.title: Connect your Amazon store to Shippo
amazon.description: To connect, select the country of your Amazon store and click <0>Connect</0> to sign in to your account and sync your Amazon orders into Shippo.
amazon.label: Country

ebayCA.title: Connect your eBay Canada store to Shippo
ebayCA.description: To connect, you’ll be redirected to eBay.ca to grant access to Shippo. After that, your accounts will be linked and your orders will be accessible in Shippo.

etsy.title: Connect your Etsy store to Shippo
etsy.description: Click <0>Connect</0> below to sign in to Etsy and connect your orders to Shippo.

facebook.title: Connect your Facebook store to Shippo
facebook.description: To connect, you’ll be redirected to Facebook to sign in. After that, your orders will be synced with Shippo.

shopify.title: Connect your Shopify store to Shippo
shopify.description: To connect, provide your Shopify URL and click <0>Connect</0> to sign in to your account and sync your Shopify orders into Shippo.
shopify.label: Shopify shop URL

walmart.title: Connect your Walmart store to Shippo
walmart.description: To connect, provide your Client ID and Client Secret and click <0>Connect</0> to sync your Walmart orders with Shippo. Click <1>here</1> for detailed instructions on how to find this information.
walmart.acknowledgeAlert: Shippo will attempt to auto-acknowledge orders on your behalf during the order import process to enable faster fulfillment.

wix.title: Connect your Wix store to Shippo
wix.description: Click <0>Connect</0> below to sign in to Wix and connect your orders to Shippo.
